name: windows_service-persistence
pattern: {"platform": "windows", "description": "ATT&CK: T1050", "queries": {"Services": {"query": "SELECT * FROM services WHERE start_type='DEMAND_START' OR start_type='AUTO_START';", "interval": 3600, "description": "Lists all installed services configured to start automatically at boot - ATT&CK T1050", "removed": false}, "Snapshot_services": {"query": "SELECT * FROM services;", "interval": 28800, "description": "Snapshot Services query", "snapshot": true}}, "name": "windows_service-persistence"}
